title: Context-Based Personalized Mathematics Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts and everyday problem-solving experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening applied mathematics competencies required for social sector job roles.

learning_goals: Learners solve math problems reflecting their personal experiences and interests with 80% accuracy
Learners revise their learning plans by utilizing personalized feedback provided by an intelligent tutoring system
Learners can identify and explain at least three math concepts related to real-life contexts

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
